char_info.char_desc: The Oni Happy With Long Hair

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are you enjoying this? This is so fun!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You better have a solution to this incident. I'm sick of this hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu, there's no way to turn this spell off. I will have to be honest.

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: All attempts anyone makes will not work.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Who the heck told you that?

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll lead you to a person who may have the answer, but only if you win a quick fight!
